description: NEW: Timeline page loads real session thumbnails via API instead of mock data
steps: Step 1: Navigate to http://localhost:34115/timeline
Step 2: Verify timeline page loads without errors
Step 3: Select a date with existing sessions
Step 4: Verify session cards display real screenshots from GetScreenshotsForSession API
Step 5: Check browser console has no errors
Step 6: Verify thumbnails match actual screenshots in database

description: NEW: Day page loads real hour-by-hour screenshots via API instead of mock data

Step 3: Select a date with existing screenshots

Step 5: Expand each hour group and verify screenshot grid displays correctly

description: NEW: Timeline page displays stats sidebar with hours worked, day span, breaks, and longest focus
steps: Step 1: Navigate to http://localhost:34115/timeline
Step 2: Select a date with session data
Step 3: Verify stats sidebar appears with hours worked metric
Step 4: Verify day span shows start time - end time
Step 5: Verify breaks count and duration display
Step 6: Verify longest focus period displays
Step 7: Verify breakdown bar chart shows focus vs breaks

description: NEW: Timeline page displays visual timeline with 4 horizontal bands (sessions, screenshots, activity, summaries)
steps: Step 1: Navigate to http://localhost:34115/timeline
Step 2: Select a date with session data
Step 3: Verify timeline bands component appears above session cards
Step 4: Verify sessions row shows color-coded blocks for each session
Step 5: Verify screenshots row shows thumbnail strip aligned to timeline
Step 6: Verify activity row shows color-coded timeline (green=focus, red=distracting, gray=neutral)
Step 7: Verify summaries row shows blue blocks where summaries exist

description: NEW: Timeline page displays tags sidebar with session tags and counts
steps: Step 1: Navigate to http://localhost:34115/timeline
Step 2: Select a date with sessions that have summaries/tags
Step 3: Verify tags sidebar appears
Step 4: Verify tags list shows all tags from the day's sessions
Step 5: Verify each tag shows its occurrence count
Step 6: Click a tag and verify sessions filter to show only sessions with that tag

description: NEW: Timeline page supports time period filtering (morning, afternoon, evening, specific apps)
steps: Step 1: Navigate to http://localhost:34115/timeline
Step 2: Select a date with sessions across different times of day
Step 3: Click 'Morning' filter button
Step 4: Verify only morning sessions (before 12pm) are displayed
Step 5: Click 'Afternoon' filter button
Step 6: Verify only afternoon sessions (12pm-5pm) are displayed
Step 7: Click 'Evening' filter button
Step 8: Verify only evening sessions (after 5pm) are displayed
Step 9: Select an app filter and verify only sessions using that app display
